flavorText: Beauty is in the eye of the exploder.

foreignData.flavorText: Was schön ist, entscheidet der Sprengmeister.
foreignData.name: Vandalenrandale
foreignData.text:
Zerstöre ein Artefakt deiner Wahl, das du nicht kontrollierst.
Überlast {4}{R} (Du kannst diesen Zauberspruch für seine Überlast-Kosten wirken. Falls du dies tust, verändere seinen Text, indem du alle Vorkommen von „ein … deiner Wahl" durch „jedes …" ersetzt.)

foreignData.flavorText: La belleza está en los ojos del que mina.
foreignData.name: Ráfaga vandálica
foreignData.text:
Destruye el artefacto objetivo que no controlas.
Sobrecarga {4}{R}. (Puedes lanzar este hechizo por su coste de sobrecarga. Si lo haces, cambia su texto reemplazando "el artefacto objetivo" por "cada artefacto".)

foreignData.flavorText: La beauté est dans l'œil du saboteur.
foreignData.name: Salve vandale
foreignData.text:
Détruisez un artefact ciblé que vous ne contrôlez pas.
Surcharge {4}{R} (Vous pouvez lancer ce sort pour son coût de surcharge. Si vous faites ainsi, modifiez son texte en remplaçant toutes les occurrences de « ciblé(e) » par « chaque ».)

foreignData.flavorText: La bellezza è nell'occhio di chi piazza la bomba.
foreignData.name: Esplosione Vandalica
foreignData.text:
Distruggi un artefatto bersaglio che non controlli.
Sovraccarico {4}{R} (Puoi lanciare questa magia per il suo costo di sovraccarico. Se lo fai, cambiane il testo sostituendo "un artefatto bersaglio" con "ogni artefatto".)

foreignData.flavorText: 美は爆破者の目に宿る。
foreignData.name: 汚損破
foreignData.text:
あなたがコントロールしていないアーティファクト１つを対象とする。それを破壊する。
超過{4}{R}（あなたはこの呪文を超過コストで唱えてもよい。そうしたなら、対象は取らず、あなたがコントロールしていないすべてのアーティファクトを破壊する。）

foreignData.flavorText: A beleza está nos olhos de quem detona a explosão.
foreignData.name: Explosão Vandálica
foreignData.text:
Destrua o artefato alvo que você não controla.
Sobrecarga {4}{R} (Você pode conjurar esta mágica pagando seu custo de sobrecarga. Se fizer isso, altere seu texto substituindo todas as ocorrências de "o artefato alvo" por "cada artefato".)

foreignData.name: Вандальский Взрыв
foreignData.text:
Уничтожьте целевой артефакт не под вашим контролем.
Перегрузка {4}{R} (Вы можете разыграть это заклинание за его стоимость Перегрузки. Если вы это делаете, измените в его тексте все слова «целевой» на «каждый».)

foreignData.flavorText: 爆破者的眼中尽是美景。
foreignData.name: 蛮野冲击
foreignData.text:
消灭目标不由你操控的神器。
超载{4}{R}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。如果你如此作，将其中的「目标」字样全部更改为「每个」。）

foreignData.flavorText: 爆破者的眼中盡是美景。
foreignData.name: 蠻野衝擊
foreignData.text:
消滅目標不由你操控的神器。
超載{4}{R}（你可以支付此咒語的超載費用來施放它。如果你如此作，將其中的「目標」字樣全部更改為「每個」。）

name: Vandalblast
originalText:
Destroy target artifact you don't control.
Overload {4}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

rulings.text: If you don't pay the overload cost of Vandalblast, that spell will have a single target. If you pay the overload cost, the spell won't have any targets.
Because a spell with overload doesn't target when its overload cost is paid, it may affect artifacts with hexproof or with protection from red.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you're paying (such as an overload cost), add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The mana value of the spell is determined by only its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast that spell was.
If you are instructed to cast a spell with overload “without paying its mana cost,” you can't choose to pay its overload cost instead.

text:
Destroy target artifact you don't control.
Overload {4}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
